thread.title: Kaztronix LLC Listed Among Fastest Growing INC 5000 Companies for Third Consecutive Year
thread.title_full: Kaztronix LLC Listed Among Fastest Growing INC 5000 Companies for Third Consecutive Year

title: Kaztronix LLC Listed Among Fastest Growing INC 5000 Companies for Third Consecutive Year
text: Date:10/22/2015 (PRWEB) October 22, 2015 For the fourth time in its thirteen-year history and for the third consecutive year, Kaztronix LLC was included on INC Magazine’s annually published index of the 5000 fastest-growing companies in the United States. The company’s inclusion on the INC 5000 list is based on a three-year growth rate of 46%. The workforce solutions company reported $34.4 million in revenue through increased head count with the company’s largest clients while expanding its portfolio growth in midsize and small companies. Additionally, the company’s leadership team - Michael Kasmir, Daniel Wolford, and Alan Slate - brings over 50 years of combined industry and executive experience, which has allowed the company to maintain a competitive edge by maintaining a well-established network of the best and brightest emerging talent in the technology and science industries. Kaztronix has offices in McLean, Virginia and Iselin, New Jersey but “through its applicant tracking and web-based time capture systems,” says co-founder Daniel Wolford, “the company has leveraged their technological capacity to service clients remotely throughout the entire United States.” To date, Kaztronix has serviced clients in 37 states, including several multinational brands. “Although our brick and mortar offices are on the East Coast, the company has serviced a national client base from day one,” says co-founder Michael Kasmir. “Wherever we operate, our mission continues to be focused on providing clients, candidates and team members with the opportunity for growth and a promising future. About Kaztronix: Kaztronix was founded in 2002 with a vision to impact the staffing industry by making the finest talent and consulting solutions easily accessible to organizations and industries. Kaztronix supports industry verticals in the pharmaceutical, consumer health, biotechnology, medical devices and healthcare industries through their scientific division and the cable television, information technology, staff telecommunications, and government contracting industries through their technology divisions. In both divisions, the company fosters continued growth and success through providing clients, candidates, and team members with direction and the opportunity for growth. Media Contact: Sheila Vanderhorn, SPHR Kaztronix LLC
